title: Development Lead
description: I am a versatile software engineer with experience in various domains, including influencer management platforms, financial reconcilers, and social apps. With my strong technical skills, problem-solving abilities, and proactive mindset, I excel in collaborating with cross-functional teams and delivering projects on time. I am constantly seeking personal and professional growth, open to feedback, and dedicated to continuous improvement.
